metrics_conclusion: o8y has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
o8y is written in the key of C♯ Locrian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 6th most popular key among Locrian keys and     the 78th most popular  among all keys. The C♯ Locrian scale is similar to the C♯ Minor scale except that both the 2nd and the 5th notes (D and G) are a half step lower.  This means that the characteristic "home base" chord of C♯ Locrian has a dissonant diminished quality (c#˚), which makes it a very uncommon choice for songs.

See the C♯ Locrian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
